alert.note: Alert for Huron; Sanilac; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 15 at 9:58PM EST until November 17 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Late night and early morning accumulation of 1 to 3 inches with an additional 1 to 3 inches expected Wednesday afternoon and evening. * WHERE...Huron, Tuscola and Sanilac Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight EST Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Steady snow continues tonight with a few periods of higher rate off Lake Huron through sunrise. A mid morning break is then followed by periods of lake effect snow showers Wednesday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Road conditions are expected to become slick and hazardous as temperatures drop below freezing. Use extra caution and allow extra time while traveling.
